revised_title: Investigating the Heights of Places in the Trigonometrical Survey of Great Britain and the Latitude of Arbury Hill
tldr: The author examines the heights of various locations in the Trigonometrical Survey of Great Britain and investigates the latitude of Arbury Hill. The study reveals discrepancies in the calculated heights and latitudes, suggesting potential errors in the survey's data. The author recommends further observations to refine the accuracy of the survey's results.
